{{Description|A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.}}
'''Seasoned Hunter's Bow''' is a 2-Star [[bow]].

==Ascensions and Stats==
{{Weapon Ascensions and Stats
|ascendMat1 = Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth
|ascendMat2 = Boreal Wolf's Cracked Tooth
|ascendMat3 = Boreal Wolf's Broken Fang
|bossMat1   = Dead Ley Line Branch
|bossMat2   = Dead Ley Line Leaves
|commonMat1 = Treasure Hoarder Insignia
|commonMat2 = Silver Raven Insignia
}}

==Description==
A hunter must always be downwind, and must never walk upright on a mountain's ridge.<br />
It matters not if their target is beast, monster or the wicked &mdash; this method remains the same.

*Dropped when interacting with some [[Investigation]] points
*[[Allan]] dialogue reward

{{Shop Availability}}

==Trivia==
*During the Archon Quest of Chapter I, Act I: Of the Land Amidist the Monoliths, specifically during [[Rite of Descension]], Childe is seen wielding this bow to save the traveler from the [[Millelith]].
